快速开始¶

对话¶

from chat.qa import Robot

robot = Robot()
answer = robot.search(question="你好", userid="userid")
print(answer)

配置¶

from chat.qa import Robot

robot = Robot()
answer = robot.config(info="", userid="userid")
print(answer)
